CALLOUT.TASK: Multiple callers reporting at least one vehicle disabled, possible injuries.

DRIVER.TEXT: ~o~Driver:~s~ Hello, what's going oooon...
~y~You:~s~ Hello, can you tell me what has happened?
~o~Driver:~s~ I dunno, man... I was… I was just drivin'. Lights, screech — next thing I know we're here. I'm fine, I'm fine, really. Just a little dizzy.
~y~You:~s~ Have you been drinking or taking anything?
~o~Driver:~s~ Look, I don't wanna make trouble — yeah, I had a few. It's just a couple, honest. I can walk, I can talk. Keys? Uh—my bag's in the back. Sorry, officer, I don't mean no harm.
~y~You:~s~ Do you remember what happened before the crash?
~o~Driver:~s~ I — blur. Head spins. There was headlights, then metal... I remember the other car — oh god, are they okay? I didn't hit nobody on purpose.
~y~You:~s~ Stay where you are. Don't move, I'm going to check on the other driver.
~o~Driver:~s~ Yeah... please. Tell 'em I'm sorry. Tell 'em I'm real sorry...

DRIVER2.TEXT: ~y~You:~s~ You're at the scene of a collision. Can you tell me what happened?
~o~Driver2:~s~ I... I don't remember. One moment I was driving, then — pain. My head feels fuzzy. I can't really see clearly. My left shoulder hurts. I don't know how it happened.
~y~You:~s~ Do you know if anyone else was involved? Any other car or person?
~o~Driver2:~s~ I... I heard a loud sound. There was braking... maybe another vehicle. I can't tell, I'm sorry. Could you call an ambulance? It hurts to move.
~y~You:~s~ Help is on the way. Try to stay calm and still. Your name?
~o~Driver2:~s~ It's... Please... don't let me bleed out...

DRIVER.TEXT: ~o~Driver:~s~ Officer... I–I don’t feel good...
~y~You:~s~ Try to stay calm. What happened?
~o~Driver:~s~ I was driving... chest started burning... vision went blurry... I tried to pull over but... guess I didn’t make it.
~y~You:~s~ Are you hurt anywhere else?
~o~Driver:~s~ No... just this pressure... like someone’s sitting on my chest... please, I can’t breathe right.
~y~You:~s~ Medical is here, they’ll take care of you. Don’t move more than you have to.
~o~Driver:~s~ Thank you... just... don’t let me pass out.

MEDIC.TEXT: ~r~Medic:~s~ Officer, we’ve got the patient. Symptoms look cardiac. We need space to work.
~y~You:~s~ Understood. Anything you need from me?
~r~Medic:~s~ Keep the traffic back and give us a few minutes. We’ll stabilize and transport.

MEDIC2.TEXT: ~r~Medic2:~s~ BP is low, pulse irregular. Prepping oxygen.
~y~You:~s~ Is the patient going to be okay?
~r~Medic2:~s~ Too early to tell, but we’ve got it under control. Thanks for the quick response.

DRIVER.TEXT: ~o~Driver:~s~ Officer! Thank god you’re here!
~y~You:~s~ What happened?
~o~Driver:~s~ My front tire just exploded out of nowhere! Car jerked sideways and I lost control.
~y~You:~s~ Any injuries?
~o~Driver:~s~ Just a few scratches and a bit shaken. Thought the whole car was gonna flip.
~y~You:~s~ I will call an ambulance for you. Did you hit anything else?
~o~Driver:~s~ Yes, I skidded into the guardrail and hit it. Scared the hell out of me.
~y~You:~s~ Stay here while I check the vehicle. We might need a tow truck for it.
~o~Driver:~s~ Officer, sorry for the mess…
~y~You:~s~ What seems to be the issue?
~o~Driver:~s~ Front tire went flat while I was driving. Car started wobbling, so I braked hard and ended up stopping like this.
~y~You:~s~ Anyone injured?
~o~Driver:~s~ No, just annoyed. Could’ve been worse though.
~y~You:~s~ Do you need roadside assistance?
~o~Driver:~s~ Yeah… that’d be great. I’ve got no spare.
~o~Driver:~s~ That blackout came out of nowhere! Everything went dark!
~y~You:~s~ Tell me what happened.
~o~Driver:~s~ Streetlights died instantly. Couldn’t see a damn thing ahead of me. I tried to brake but I was already too close to the curb.
~y~You:~s~ Any electrical issues with your car?
~o~Driver:~s~ Yeah, the dashboard flickered right before I hit. Maybe the power surge messed with the car too.
~y~You:~s~ Alright, stay put. I’ll check the area.
~o~Driver:~s~ Please do. Feels like the whole city just switched off.
~o~Driver:~s~ Officer, look — he braked way too hard! I had no time to react!
~y~You:~s~ Were you speeding?
~o~Driver:~s~ Maybe a little… traffic was light, I thought it was fine.
~y~You:~s~ How fast were you going?
~o~Driver:~s~ I… don’t know. Faster than I should’ve, okay?
~y~You:~s~ Stay here while I check the other driver.
~o~Driver:~s~ Just great… this day is ruined.

DRIVER2.TEXT: ~o~Driver2:~s~ Officer! He was flying behind me! I checked my mirror and he was right on me!
~o~Driver2:~s~ I was keeping with traffic! He came out of nowhere!
~o~Driver2:~s~ No, just rattled. But he needs to slow down before he kills someone.
~y~You:~s~ I’ll talk to him. Stay here.
~o~Driver2:~s~ Thanks. I just want my car intact...
